name: Freddy
description:
Follow Freddy, the adorable dog, into an adventure! Fight tough enemies, outsmart deadly traps, collect various bonuses and explore the world!



The game is a 2D platformer, made in Unity and inspired by early 90's PC classics like Commander Keen, Aladdin, Lion King and Prince of Persia.

Key Features:

  • 5 action packed levels, including an epic boss fight.
  • A simple, heartwarming story, presented in charming Pixel Art style.
  • Interactive environments, filled with small puzzles and mischievous enemies.
  • Fairly challenging gameplay, backed by a reliable checkpoint system.
  • Keyboard and Xbox controller support.

Installation:
You can either use the installer, or alternatively download the zip file and extract the contents to your preferred location.
